languages.text: "Шерин, смени свой гнев на милость — что взять пресветлому Вольному Торговцу с несчастных оборванцев, чей слабый дух не вынес и толчка судьбы?"
"Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"
languages.original_text: "Шерин, смени свой гнев на милость — что взять пресветлому Вольному Торговцу с несчастных оборванцев, чей слабый дух не вынес и толчка судьбы?"

traits.locale_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from threadbare sods whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"
"Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from threadbare sods whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"
"Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"
"Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"
"Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

languages.text: 「いいじゃん、許してあげれば。運命の一撃にも耐えられないような弱々しい精神を持っている、ボロ雑巾に身を包んだ哀れな者に対して、栄えある自由開拓者は何を期待するというの？」
languages.original_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

traits.locale_text: 「いいじゃん、許してあげれば。運命の一撃にも耐えられないような弱々しい精神を持っている、ボロ雑巾に身を包んだ哀れな者に対して、栄えある自由開拓者は何を期待するというの？」

languages.text: “好了，亲爱的，宽宏大量点吧。你是声名显赫的行商浪人，他们是一群衣衫褴褛的可怜人，连命运的一次打击都承受不住。你能指望他们怎么样呢？”
languages.original_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

traits.locale_text: “好了，亲爱的，宽宏大量点吧。你是声名显赫的行商浪人，他们是一群衣衫褴褛的可怜人，连命运的一次打击都承受不住。你能指望他们怎么样呢？”

languages.text: «Venga, shereen, déjelo. ¿Qué puede esperar {mf|un distinguido|una distinguida} Comerciante Independiente como usted de unos pordioseros cuyos débiles espíritus no pueden soportar ni un solo golpe del destino?».
languages.original_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

traits.locale_text: «Venga, shereen, déjelo. ¿Qué puede esperar {mf|un distinguido|una distinguida} Comerciante Independiente como usted de unos pordioseros cuyos débiles espíritus no pueden soportar ni un solo golpe del destino?».

languages.text: « Allons, shereen, du calme. Qu'attendiez-vous d'autre de la part d'une bande de miséreux en haillons à l'esprit trop faible pour résister à un unique coup du sort ? »
languages.original_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

traits.locale_text: « Allons, shereen, du calme. Qu'attendiez-vous d'autre de la part d'une bande de miséreux en haillons à l'esprit trop faible pour résister à un unique coup du sort ? »

languages.text: "Seid nicht so, Shereen, zeigt Nachsicht. Was kann {mf|ein bedeutender Freihändler|eine bedeutende Freihändlerin} schon von Würmern in Lumpen erwarten, deren schwacher Geist keinem einzigen Hieb des Schicksals standhalten würde?"
languages.original_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Seid nicht so, Shereen, zeigt Nachsicht. Was kann {mf|ein bedeutender Freihändler|eine bedeutende Freihändlerin} schon von Würmern in Lumpen erwarten, deren schwacher Geist keinem einzigen Hieb des Schicksals standhalten würde?"

languages.text: "Hadi ama şirinim, merhamet göster biraz. Şanlı bir Hür Tacir, kaderin tek bir cilvesine bile karşı koyamayan bu zayıf ruhlu çaresiz zavallılardan ne bekleyebilir ki?"
languages.original_text: "Come now, shereen, relent. What can an illustrious Rogue Trader expect from wretches in rags whose weak spirit could not withstand a single blow of fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Hadi ama şirinim, merhamet göster biraz. Şanlı bir Hür Tacir, kaderin tek bir cilvesine bile karşı koyamayan bu zayıf ruhlu çaresiz zavallılardan ne bekleyebilir ki?"
